faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our services

items.question: What is your typical project timeline?
items.answer: Project timelines vary depending on scope and complexity. Simple websites typically take 2-4 weeks, while complex applications can take 3-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation.

items.question: Do you provide ongoing support and maintenance?
items.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive support and maintenance packages to ensure your solutions continue to perform optimally. This includes updates, security patches, and technical support.

items.question: What technologies do you specialize in?
items.answer: We specialize in modern web technologies (React, Vue, Node.js), mobile development (React Native, Flutter), cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), and emerging technologies like AI/ML.

items.question: How do you ensure project quality?
items.answer: We follow rigorous testing procedures, code reviews, and agile development practices. Our quality assurance process includes automated testing, performance optimization, and security audits.

footer.description: Leading technology company focused on innovation and digital transformation. We help businesses thrive in the digital age with cutting-edge solutions.
